marklogic.body:
if Zimmerman was on his back, and Trayvon was on top of him Poised to hit (not yet hit him), and Trayvon was saying that he intended to kill Zimmerman (as the article says), does Zimmerman still have the right to pull out his gun to protect himself?
yep.
not sure why all you dolts (CNN included) think 'extent of Zimmerman's injuries' is even relevant.
both eye witnesses (the rest all heard, not saw) agree Zimmerman was on his back, and Trayvon was above him and striking him.
this is why Zimmerman walks.
not because his nose "Bled enough".
dummasses.
